MAIN_SCREEN.TITLE: 'Join {appname} and find your partner on a common criteria!'

ARE_YOU_SURE.title: Are you sure?
ARE_YOU_SURE.photomessage: This photo will be removed from the photos list.
ARE_YOU_SURE.backmessage: You will lose registration process once you leave this page.

EMAIL_VERIFICATION.EXPLANATION_TEXT: We will send you a verification code to pair your e-mail adress within your account.

WHAT_IS_YOUR_NAME.EXPLANATION: Your name will be visible to other users.

WHAT_IS_YOUR_BIRTHDAY.EXPLANATION: This will be visible to other users , and used for matching purposes.

MESSAGES.ONE: It seems we have an unexpected error for now, please try later on.
MESSAGES.TWO: It seemd we have an unexpected error for now, please try again.
MESSAGES.ALREADYREGISTERED: You can try to login your account.
MESSAGES.NOACC: There is not an account with that email adress.
MESSAGES.WRONGPASS: Your password is not correct, please try again.
MESSAGES.GOOGLE: You could not sign in successfully via Google , please try again.

EMAIL.NOTVALID: Please enter a valid email adress!
